DOC.brief_summary: The study assess safety performance intragastric auto-inflating degradable balloon
DOC.brief_title: Safety Performance Evaluation Tulip Device Healthy Overweight Obese Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The study assess safety performance intragastric auto-inflating degradable balloon , pack swallow-able capsule , healthy subject 30 < BMI≤ 35 .
DOC.criteria: 21 ≤ Age < 65 year 30 < BMI ≤ 35 kg/m2 Healthy without medication ; No history weight reduction 5 % total body weight past 6 month ; Normal blood count chemistry ; Hemoglobin level 11 ; At least 3 bowel movement per week ; Subject declare he/she able go gastroscopic examination ; Subject able willing give inform consent follow protocol procedure . Any history evidence significant cardiac , renal , neurologic , metabolic , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , hematologic abnormality , chronic hepatic disease disease judgment investigator would interfere study confound result ; History evidence active liver disease . ( abnormal liver function : > 1.5 time upper limit ) ; History symptom thyroid disease control medication ; Abnormal gastrointestinal finding : Diaphragmatic hernia > 3 cm ; Active peptic ulcer ; Erosive gastritis ; Gastric outlet obstruction ; Subject IBD Significant swallow disorder ; Past history gastrointestinal surgery ( exclude uncomplicated appendectomy ) ; Malabsorption disorder . Is take medication reduce gastric acidity Currently use pharmaceutical agent food supplement weight loss ; History current eat disorder anorexia bulimia compulsory overeat . History food Allergy ; Subject poor venous access ; Is take chronic aspirin nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent , medication know gastric irritant ; Have coagulation problem and/or take anticoagulant medication ; Evidence current malignant disease ; Have history acute disease ( viral , bacterial , pain , accident ) last 6 week . Female subject breastfeed positive pregnancy test screening time study ; Inability give write informed consent ; History alcohol drug abuse within 6 month screen ; Mental disorder ; Currently participate ongoing clinical study Any reason make patient poor candidate opinion investigator .
